thread.title_full: Huntsville Mardi Gras Parade 2017 this Saturday Feb. 25th

author: Bob Gathany | bgathany@al.com
title: Huntsville Mardi Gras Parade 2017 this Saturday Feb. 25th
text: The 2017 Huntsville Mardi Gras Parade takes place Saturday Feb. 25th. This will be the 4th year for the annual Carnival celebration in downtown Huntsville. The parade is a benefit for the Blount Hospitality House which provides lodging and supportive accommodations for families of critically ill patients seeking treatment at area hospitals.
